meanings: (감정 등의)[명사] explosion, outburst, [동사] explode, blow up, burst out
(폭탄·화산 등의)[명사] explosion, detonation, blast, (화산의) eruption, [동사] explode, blow up, detonate, go off, (화산이) erupt

examples.korean: She was alarmed by his violent outburst. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그의 폭력적인 감정 폭발에 겁이 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
